knimeNode.name: Modify Date
knimeNode.shortDescription: Modifies date information of a date&time cell.

fullDescription.intro:
Modifies date&time columns by
appending a date to local time columns (output type is local or zoned date time column),
changing the date in local or zoned date&time columns, or
removing the date from local or zoned date&time columns (output type is local time).

tab.name: Column Selection
tab.option: Only the included columns will be modified.

tab.name: Replace/Append Selection
tab.option: The selected columns will be appended to the input table. The suffix of the appended columns can be provided in the text field to the right.
The selected columns will be replaced by the new columns.

tab.name: Date Selection
tab.option: Appends a date to local time columns. Optionally a time zone can be appended too.
Changes the date of local or zoned date&time columns. The time zone will not be changed. The Modify Time Zone node can be used to change it.
Removes the date from local or zoned date&time columns. Time zones will be removed too.
If checked, a fixed time zone will be added.
If Add time zone is checked, the user can choose the time zone here.
